errors.validation.password: Invalid Password. The password must have up to 6 characters and at least one number
errors.validation.maxlength: This field must have up to {{requiredLength}} characters
errors.validation.minlength: This field must have at least {{requiredLength}} characters
errors.validation.max: Must be greather or equal to {{max}}
errors.validation.min: Must be less or equal to {{min}}

messages.confirm_record_delete: Do you really wish to remove the record?

authentication.login.header.message: Inform your username and password to continue
authentication.password-recovery.message.success.descri: Check your mailbox to create a new password. If you don't receive the email in the next few minutes, check your spam box. Pay Attention: The sent code is valid only for the next 24 hours.
authentication.password-recovery.desc: Inform your username and we will send the password reset instructions to your E-mail
authentication.update-password.message.success.title: Password changed
authentication.update-password.message.success.descript: Your password has been updated. Now you can login in the application.
authentication.update-password.message.error.title: Invalid Token
authentication.update-password.message.error.descriptio: If your request is older than 24 hours, this token may have expired, request a new one on Login Screen.

error.500.title: Server error
error.500.message: There was an unexpeted error on server while your request was being processed.
error.404.title: Page not found
error.404.message: The page tou requested does not exist or there was a error processing your request. Reload the page and contact our support if the error continues.
error.403.title: Forbidden
error.403.message: You don't have access to this page.
error.hash-message: When reporting the error, please inform the following code so we can identify the error: {{code}}
error.offline.title: Server is offline
error.offline.message: The Backend applications seems to be offline. try again in a few minutes, if the problem persist, contact ou support team.
error.init.title: The Application cannot be started
